EmailTemplate.name: Follow up: Turbonomic 60-Day License (1507298282.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: Follow up: Turbonomic 60-Day License (1507298282.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Dear {{Lead.First Name}}, Thank you for your time today. Below are some points we discussed on our call that I would like to reaffirm: At the beginning of the 60-day license: - A representative from your company will attend a Zoom/WebEx meeting for a Turbonomic engineer to apply the license key to your Turbonomic product download. - In conjunction with your company rep on the call, we will turn on automated v-motions in Turbonomic – PLEASE NOTE: Turbonomic will respect any existing policies and affinity/anti-affinity rules. At the end of the 60-day license: - A representative from your company will attend a 30-minute Zoom/WebEx to allow us to capture data on improvements delivered by Turbonomic. - A representative from your company will attend a 30-minute Zoom/WebEx to allow us to present back to you and your organisation the improvements that Turbonomic has delivered. We look forward to working with you during the next two months, whilst you take advantage of our EXCLUSIVE VMWORLD PROMO. Best regards, **Ahmed Mohamed** Turbonomic500 Boylston Street, 8th Floor Boston, MA 02116 <[[https://www.youtube.com/user/myTurbonomicTV]]> <[[https://www.linkedin.com/company/turbonomic]]> <[[https://www.twitter.com/turbonomic]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/turbonomic]]>
